nodes.bodyText: Do we need to wait to avoid the leader election?
hmm, good question. I don't know! I'll find out, though...
The updated code here creates just one request to delete all topics, and also just waits for the delete request to be acked, not for the delete to be fully synced to the whole cluster.
Nit (feel free to ignore): Should stopAsync be before awaitStoppedAndPurge ?
Should we actually capture AssertionError instead of InterruptedException? I think when it times out the former is thrown not the latter.
Oh, yeah, you're right. I was just reacting to the checked exception. I'll fix it. In fact, we should probably rethrow for the InterruptedException.
We should use try-with-resource to make sure the AdminClient gets closed.
I thought this could throw, too?

I guess it could, but it's just directly reading the topics from zookeeper (of which there's only one node in the cluster). If that fails, it seems like everything else would also fail, so it's probably pointless to even bother closing the brokers. Similarly, calling shutdown on the first broker could also throw, but we don't bother catching there to continue closing the rest of the cluster.
